entities.description: Use of sedatives or tranquilizers by the respondents.
Problems at work, school, or home caused by sedative use.
Problems with family or friends caused by sedative use.
Impact on important social, occupational, or recreational activities due to sedative use.
Physical health problems caused by sedative use.
Emotional or mental health problems caused by sedative use.
Symptoms experienced when cutting back or stopping the use of sedatives.
The past 12 months period referenced in the survey.

relationships.description: Indicates that sedative use has caused problems at work, school, or home.
Indicates that sedative use has caused issues with family or friends.
Indicates the impact of sedative use on important social, occupational, or recreational activities.
Indicates physical health problems caused by sedative use.
Indicates emotional or mental health problems caused by sedative use.
Indicates the symptoms experienced when cutting back or stopping the use of sedatives.
Relates sedative use to the past 12 months period referenced in the survey.
